name: Crowned Heads - Court Reserve XVIII - Sublime
additionalNotes: The Court Reserve XVIII is Crowned Heads’ first venture into creating a special reserve line. Crowned Heads produced only 150,000 sticks (sold in 20-count boxes) of the Reserve XVIII so you might want to stock up on this limited edition while it’s still around. The Court Reserve XVIII is available in three vitolas: Corona Gorda, Robusto, and Sublime. Medium to full-bodied, the Court Reserve XVII features a Mexican San Andrés wrapper with a chocolatey and woodsy profile and hints of pepper.
